offences.wording:
ON TUESDAY 10-OCTOBER-2019 AT JACKSON STREET DISHONESTLY
                        RECEIVED STOLEN GOODS NAMELY WATCH OF A VALUE UNKNOWN BELONGING TO HILDA
                        ROBERTS KNOWING OR BELIEVING THE SAME TO BE STOLEN GOODS. CONTRARY TO
                        SECTION 22(1) OF THE THEFT ACT 1968.####Contrary to section 4(1) of the Road Traffic Act 1988 and Schedule 2 to the Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988.

prosecutionCasesOrApplications.applicationType: Conviction of an offence while a community order is in force
